description: Complex message scenario with various event types

samples.description: msg-filtered-01: You have built 3 factories on Mungle
msg-filtered-02: You have built 3 mines on Mungle
msg-filtered-03: Mungle has completed its orders. The production queue is empty

otherMessages.description: Messages not in production events section (research, population, discoveries)

samples.description: The population on Purgatory has decreased by 200 colonists due to overcrowding
Your scientists have completed research into Tech Level 12 for Weapons
Your recent breakthrough in Weapons has also given you the Mini Blaster benefit
Your recent breakthrough in Weapons has also given you the Jihad Missile benefit
Found uninhabitable planet Steppenwolf (1.50% death rate)
Found habitable planet Sadie (4.40% growth rate)
